sentences: Cassettes Won't Listen is the American indie rock and electronic one-man project, of multi-instrumentalist and record producer Jason Drake, based out of Brooklyn, New York, United States.
Drake released Small-Time Machine himself through distributor, The Orchard, along with his 2009 instrumental record, Into The Hillside.
On May 12 he was served with a cease and desist from actor Kevin Spacey and his legal team forcing him to change the name of his upcoming record.
